source.sqlReaderQuery:
/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
SELECT  [ITEM_NUMBER]
      ,[ORGANIZATION_CODE]
      ,[SUBINVENTORY_NAME]
      ,[TRANSACTION_QUANTITY]
      ,[TRANSACTION_DATE]
      ,[TRANSACTION_REFERENCE]
      ,[LOCATOR_NAME]
      ,[TRANSACTION_COST]
        ,COALESCE('',[FM_SERIAL_NUMBER]) as [FM_SERIAL_NUMBER]
		  ,COALESCE('',[TO_SERIAL_NUMBER]) as [TO_SERIAL_NUMBER]
      
      ,[Distribution_Account]
      ,[ORG_NAME]
	  		  ,COALESCE('',[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE1]) as [PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE1]
       ,COALESCE('',[PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE2]) as [PE_EXT_ATTRIBUTE2]
   
  FROM [inventory].[Parts_Inventory_Transactions]
